```{r}

rm(list = ls())
source("header.R")

df <- st_read("data/mst/hex_merged_w_stats.gpkg")

```

# General Plot
```{r}

years <- seq(1885, 1965, 10)

year_select <- years[1]

for (year_select in years) {
  
  g <- ggplot(data = df %>% filter(year == year_select)) +
    geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_ct_sum_10)) +
    theme_minimal() + 
    labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)
  
  g <- ggplot(data = df %>% filter(year == year_select)) +
    geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_rt_mean_10)) +
    theme_minimal() + 
    labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)
  
    g <- ggplot(data = df %>% filter(year == year_select)) +
    geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_pbldg_mean_10)) +
    theme_minimal() + 
    labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)
  
  
}
 
```


## Investigate 1950

```{r}

df_1950 <- df %>% filter(year == 1950)
df_1950_bk_1 <- df_1950 %>% filter(bk_res_1 > 0)
  
g <- ggplot(data = df_1950) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_rt_mean_10)) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)

```
